meta.title: Pull-Up Club | The Ultimate Pull-Up Competition
meta.description: Join the Battle Bunker Pull-Up Club, the ultimate online pull-up competition. Submit your videos, get judged, and climb the global leaderboard to earn badges and prizes.
meta.ogTitle: Pull-Up Club | The Ultimate Pull-Up Competition
meta.ogDescription: Compete with athletes worldwide in the ultimate test of strength. Can you top the leaderboard?

hero.title: Welcome to Pull-Up Club
hero.subtitle: Earn $1 per rep. First Submission is free.
hero.pullUpsToday: <0>{{count}}</0> pull-ups completed in the last 24 hours

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Join the Battle Bunker Pull-Up Challenge in three simple steps. Show your strength and compete with athletes worldwide.

step1.title: 1. Record & Submit
step1.description: Record your best pull-up performance, post it publicly and submit the video link along with a fee.

step2.title: 2. Get Reviewed
step2.description: Our team will review your submission for proper form and count your pull-ups.

step3.title: 3. Join the Leaderboard
step3.description: Once verified, your performance will be featured on our global leaderboard.

perks.title: Battle Bunker Pull-Up Club Perks
perks.subtitle: When you enlist, you don't just join a club. You join a movement. Here's what you get:

perk1.title: OFFICIAL ENTRY PATCH
perk1.description: Earn your first stripe. Every member receives an exclusive Battle Bunker Pull-Up Club patch shipped directly to their doorstep. This is your badge of honor — no reps, no patch.

perk2.title: QUARTERLY COLLECTOR'S PATCH
perk2.description: Each quarter we drop a brand-new, limited-edition patch — pull-up club members will receive the patch shipped to their doorstep. Miss it? You'll never see it again.

perk3.title: TIER RANKING SYSTEM
perk3.description: You're ranked based on performance — Recruit, Proven, Hardened, Operator, Elite. This isn't participation. You earn your way up, and the community sees it.

perk4.title: OFFICIAL LEADERBOARD
perk4.description: Once verified, your name is locked in. Compete with the best, track your climb, and let the numbers speak for themselves. Leaderboard only displays active pull-up club members.

perk5.title: TIER-RESTRICTED GEAR ACCESS
perk5.description: Want the gear? Earn it. Exclusive merch unlocks only at certain tiers. No shortcuts, no excuses — you rock what you've proven.

perk6.title: SOCIAL SPOTLIGHT
perk6.description: Tag us in your submission videos, patch photos and comeback stories and get featured. We share 100% of the community.

leaderboardPreview.title: Top Competitors
leaderboardPreview.subtitle: Check out our current leaderboard champions. Will your name be on this list?

testimonial1.quote: Battle Bunker's Pull-Up Challenge pushed me to my limits. I went from 15 to 25 pull-ups in just two months!
testimonial1.author: Mike Johnson

testimonial2.quote: The leaderboard keeps me motivated. Seeing my name climb each week is incredibly satisfying.
testimonial2.author: Sarah Williams

testimonial3.quote: This platform created friendly competition among my members. Everyone's training harder!
testimonial3.author: Dave Rodriguez

ctaSection.title: Ready to Test Your Strength?
ctaSection.subtitle: Join hundreds of athletes already competing in the Battle Bunker Pull-Up Challenge. Show the world what you're capable of!
